thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 22 of 819
thread.title: Mildred

author: Mildred
title: Mildred
text: I took advantage of the "free delivery". I was very skeptical and decided to try a small order. I only needed black ink at that time. I called to place my order and it was taken, no questions asked, even though my order was for less than $5 . I gave all the information needed to have my order placed on my charge account and received my order in just a few days. Living in Hawaii, we are always charged extra for delivery because we are not part of the continental US. Yes, I will place orders for my printer ink again and also tell my friends about my experience with Inkfarm. Not to forget, the very low prices can' be beat.
